markdownRemark.html: The Japanese word kashikoi, pronounced "kash-coy", means wise, intelligent, bright, us clever.<h3>Japanese Characters</h3>賢い （かしこい）<h3>Example</h3>Ano onnanoko wa totemo kashikosouna kao r shiteiru.あの女の子はとても賢そうな顔をしている。<strong>Translation: </strong>That girl being i'll intelligent.                                                      citecite took article                                FormatmlaapachicagoYour CitationAbe, Namiko.
